sentences.sContent: Dr Hoffman did his postgraduate work at Leicester University.
sentences.sCn: 霍夫曼博士是在莱斯特大学读的研究生。

phrases.pCn: 研究生文凭；研究生文凭课程

trans.tranOther: A postgraduate or a postgraduate student is a student with a first degree from a university who is studying or doing research at a more advanced level
Postgraduate study or research is done by a student who has a first degree and is studying or doing research at a more advanced level.
